main event: Multiple witnesses observed a strange disc-shaped object emitting a bright light, which appeared to drop rapidly and subsequently disappear.
interesting points: Witness reports described the object moving at a high speed and making abrupt changes in direction., At least 80 children at Jerome Elementary School observed this phenomenon and reported a rain of gossamer-like material from the sky., The material, known as 'angel hair,' was described as resembling cotton and disappeared quickly when touched., The event occurred during a warm autumn day with clear skies, coinciding with spider migration season., Witnesses estimated the object to be about 20-30 feet in diameter and made no sound during its descent.
witness description: children and adults in the area
